Title: Relates to establishing a presumption relating to heart conditions incurred by deputy sheriffs in cities of one million or more
Summary: Relates to establishing a presumption relating to heart conditions incurred by deputy sheriffs in cities of one million or more; provides that deputy sheriff members retiring due to such heart conditions shall receive a pension equal to three-fourths of his or her final average salary.
LawCode: Add ยง207-r, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to establishing a presumption relating to heart conditions incurred by deputy sheriffs in cities of one million or more
